jtbdStatement: Help SMEs curate ground truth items effectively (enhancements)

topics.name: assignment-error-feedback
topics.description: The assignment error feedback system displays specific, actionable messages when assignment operations fail due to conflicts.

topics.name: assignment-takeover
topics.description: The assignment takeover system allows SMEs to reassign items currently assigned to others with appropriate confirmation.

topics.name: explorer-state-preservation
topics.description: The explorer state preservation system maintains filter and view state when users perform actions that navigate away.

topics.name: draft-duplicate-detection
topics.description: The draft duplicate detection system warns SMEs when draft items appear to duplicate approved items.

topics.name: modal-keyboard-handling
topics.description: The modal keyboard handling system ensures keyboard shortcuts do not unexpectedly close or interfere with modal interactions.

topics.name: validation-error-clarity
topics.description: The validation error clarity system translates backend validation errors into user-friendly messages with remediation guidance.

topics.name: inspection-performance
topics.description: The inspection performance system caches and memoizes data to improve responsiveness when viewing ground truth items.
